name: com.meta.xr.mrutilitykit
description: Helper tools & functions to simplify development with Scene API. Works on Mac & PC, without a device attached.

samples.description: A basic scene showing the core functionality of MR Utility Kit
A scene showing how to find a floor zone
A scene showing how to spawn objects in different locations within the room
A scene showing how to create a nav mesh for navigation
A scene showing the prefab spawner functionality
A scene showing the effect of virtual shadows and highlights on scene objects
A scene showing virtual balls interacting with physical environment
A scene with basic decorations and SceneDecorator to populate the environment
A scene showing how to spawn a global mesh that can be segmented, usually used to create destructible environments
A scene showing how to use EnvironmentRaycastManager to attach virtual panel to physical environment.
A scene with the SpaceMap prefab added. It creates a texture which represents the room with a color gradient according to the settings of the prefab.
A scene demonstrating generic keyboard detection and tracking. This sample requires Scene permission.
